data.title: Small card signed by Hugh Grant former Mayor of New York. by Grant, Hugh: Near fine condition Unbound (1900) First Edition., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - First Edition. - Unbound - Not published, no place - 1900 - Condition: Near fine condition - Hugh Grant (dates of birth and death unknown). Mayor of New York, NY from 1889-92. Card measures 3.5 inch wide and 2.5 inch tall, and is boldly inscribed "Hugh Grant." On the card is written "1900" at the bottom left edge. Several smudges to autograph, natural in the fountain pen era. An attractive example of this signature. - Small card signed by Hugh Grant former Mayor of New York.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Delivery confirmation included on all domestic shipments. Books are mailed upon receipt of payment unless credit has been previously established. PRICES are listed in US dollars. PAYMENT options: Mastercard, Visa, Am/Ex, PayPal and money orders & checks in US funds drawn on a US bank. Merchandise is 100% guaranteed to be as-described. If item description contains an error, a full refund will be issued. If item description is correct and purchaser wishes to return the item, a small restocking fee...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Quoted shipping rates are based on shipment weights of 2.0 lbs. or less. For non-USA orders, if the book you order is larger than an octavo, is multi-volume, or is thick and those factors cause the shipment to weigh over 2.0 lbs (about 0.9kg), expect that an extra shipping charge will be assessed to cover the actual cost of the shipment. Overnight and expedited shipping is available. INSURANCE against damage or loss is included at no extra charge.
